metadata.title: CVE-2019-16225 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in py-lmdb 0.97. For certain values of mp_flags,mdb_page_touch does not properly set up mc->mc_pg[mc->top], leading to aninvalid write operation. NOTE: this outcome occurs when accessing adata.mdb file supplied by an attacker.

criterions.comment: py-lmdb package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
